text: Excited to be a participant in @ValkyrieFunds' most recent funding round! https://t.co/Dwdq7Uem4Q

Our rooftop sign at our Pittsburgh office was shining brightly in rainbow colors over the weekend to celebrate the beginning of #PrideMonth. We value and respect the diverse perspectives and unique contributions of our LGBTQ+ colleagues. https://t.co/aQOhsQu77P
